items.title: HG Infra Engineering: Why should you bet on this construction player?
items.description: The company has already carved a niche in the road construction space. Its diversification into newer segments is also yielding results and it boasts of a huge order book in the infrastructure segment

items.title: PNC Infra gets relief from High Court in disqualification order by MoRTH, NHAI
items.description: PNC Infratech and its two SPVs were disqualified by MoRTH and NHAI from participating in tendering process for a year in October. The decision was challenged by the company before the Division Bench of Delhi High Court in November through a Letters Patent Appeals.

items.title: Newgen Soft extends December rally to 44% after bagging $2.27 million Saudi Arabia order
items.description: Newgen Software is looking to expand its presence in the middle east with acquisition of new clients as well as upselling to existing customers. Shares of the company are higher by 44% in December so far, making it the top gainer among NSE 500.
